help:
Hi, I can help you to *find or meet anyone at the office*

You can control me by sending these commands:
commands: /where @username - to find where someone is should be seated
/where squadname - to find where a squard are should be
/maps - to get bukalapak offices list or map

/book city capacity start(date:time) stop(date:time) - to try book a meeting room in a specific city, capacity and time. 
```
Date time format MMM-dd:HH:mm (Ex: /book jakarta may-07:13:30 may-07:18:30)
```
help2:
*Special Feature:*
Find some new friend at the office, meet some one new and open up new work/non-work possibilities. Try these command and you wont regret it, but if it does, just try your luck another day
special: /newfriend event city - find some new friend for event [lunch/dinner] in specific city [bandung/jakarta]
